rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: A new case of highly pathogenic avian influenza has been detected at a poultry farm in Australia's southeastern Victoria state, officials said on Thursday, a day after the country reported its first human case of the virus and also a strain on an egg farm.

rationale: 'detected' and 'reported' are factual verbs. 'highly pathogenic' is a technical term.
statement_text: A new case of highly pathogenic avian influenza has been detected at a poultry farm in Australia's southeastern Victoria state, officials said on Thursday, a day after the country reported its first human case of the virus and also a strain on an egg farm.

rationale: Segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with scale/impact information.
statement_text: A new case of highly pathogenic avian influenza has been detected at a poultry farm in Australia's southeastern Victoria state, officials said on Thursday, a day after the country reported its first human case of the virus and also a strain on an egg farm.
